subject: Preakness Stakes
Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: The Maryland Racing Commission, after viewing a videotape, improved the 1973 Triple Crown winner’s time in the Preakness by more than a second.
snippet: The Maryland Racing Commission, after viewing a videotape, improved the 1973 Triple Crown winner’s time in the Preakness by more than a second.
